TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVbcHostObject implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskHost

summary.span: 定义 Vbc 任务的接口以便进行 IDE。

span.span: Defines an interface for the Vbc task to communicate with the IDE.

summary.span: 具体而言， Vbc 任务将委托实际编辑器给 IDE，而不是支付给 command-line 编译器。

span.span: In particular, the Vbc task will delegate the actual compilation to the IDE, rather than shelling out to the command-line compilers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口允许 `Vbc` 任务将项目编译委托给 IDE，而不是使用命令行编译器。This interface allows the `Vbc` task to delegate project compilation to the IDE rather than using command line compilers.
